column4: ok...something weird just happened, i was happily typing along in pidgin, and suddenly my screen goes black, and when it turns back on, i'm on the login screen
(and no i did not hit ctrl+alt+backspace by accident)
can i look up the reason for the x dying?
(ie: where is the log for this?)
hmm, it's a bit long, anything i can grep for?
is an X-crash in general something i should be worried about?
from time to time compiz seems to crash though (only on this computer, which was upgraded from a beta version of gutsy, my other computer doesn't have that problem)
- shouldn't worry too much then - lets hope you don't keep crashing ;)
- you could try looking in old logs if your worried ie Xorg.0.log.old
